article_title: Dragon Lady at 60: U-2, Global Hawk share the stage
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. og.description: Editor's Note: If you've spent any time in Yuba-Sutter, you probably know about the well-storied U-2 spy plane, and you probably know someone who's piloted or maintained it.
